IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{greeting_keywords}}[0] OR {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{greeting_keywords}}[1]

    {{judgement}} = 0

ELIF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{internal_keywords}}[0] OR {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{internal_keywords}}[1]
    {{judgement}} = 0
    {{content}} = ""

        DEFINE {{scene_kw_list}}: List = {{scene_keywords}}[{{scene}}]

        DEFINE {{scene_kw_hit}}: Boolean = False
        DEFINE {{scene_action_hit}}: Boolean = False
        FOR {{kw}} IN {{scene_kw_list}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{kw}}
                {{scene_kw_hit}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        FOR {{action}} IN {{scene_action_list}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{action}}
                {{scene_action_hit}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        IF {{scene_kw_hit}} AND {{scene_action_hit}}

    ENDFOR
    IF {{scene_hit}}

        {{content}} = CALL generate_relay_content({{input_text}})
    ELSE
        DEFINE {{action_hit}}: Boolean = False

            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        FOR {{info}} IN {{info_keywords}}

        ENDFOR
        IF {{action_hit}} AND {{info_hit}}

            {{content}} = CALL generate_relay_content({{input_text}})
        ELSE
            {{judgement}} = 0
            {{content}} = ""
        ENDIF
    ENDIF

{{output_json}} = CALL format_json({{judgement}}, {{content}})
RETURN {{output_json}}

    ctx["action_keywords"], ctx["content"], ctx["info_keywords"], ctx["judgement"], ctx["non_trigger_phrases"], ctx["scene_actions"], ctx["scene_keywords"] = step_1_compute_judgement(ctx.get("input_text"))

    # Module 7: step_7_generate_relay_content

    # Module 8: step_8_compute_judgement
    ctx["_"], ctx["content"], ctx["judgement"] = step_8_compute_judgement()

    return ctx

FOR {{kw}} IN {{report_keywords}}

        {{is_report}} = True

FOR {{kw}} IN {{internal_keywords}}
    IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{kw}}

    ENDIF
ENDFOR
IF {{is_greeting}} OR {{is_report}} OR {{is_internal}}
    {{judgement}} = 0
    {{content}} = ""
ELSE
    DEFINE {{scene_matched}}: Boolean = False
    FOR {{scene}} IN {{scene_keywords}}
        DEFINE {{scene_kw_list}}: List = {{scene_keywords}}[{{scene}}]
        DEFINE {{scene_action_list}}: List = {{scene_actions}}[{{scene}}]
        DEFINE {{kw_matched}}: Boolean = False
        DEFINE {{action_matched}}: Boolean = False
        FOR {{kw}} IN {{scene_kw_list}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{kw}}
                {{kw_matched}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        FOR {{act}} IN {{scene_action_list}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{act}}
                {{action_matched}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        IF {{kw_matched}} AND {{action_matched}}
            {{scene_matched}} = True
        ENDIF
    ENDFOR
    IF {{scene_matched}}
        {{judgement}} = 1
        {{content}} = CALL generate_relay_content({{input_text}})
    ELSE
        DEFINE {{action_found}}: Boolean = False
        DEFINE {{info_found}}: Boolean = False
        FOR {{act}} IN {{action_keywords}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{act}}
                {{action_found}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        FOR {{info}} IN {{info_keywords}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{info}}
                {{info_found}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        IF {{action_found}} AND {{info_found}}
            {{judgement}} = 1
            {{content}} = CALL generate_relay_content({{input_text}})
        ELSE
            {{judgement}} = 0
            {{content}} = ""
        ENDIF
    ENDIF
ENDIF

    "judgement": {{judgement}},
    "content": {{content}}
}
RETURN {{result}}

DEFINE {{action_keywords}}: List = ["æ ¸å®", "ç¡®è®¤", "æ•²å®š", "æ‰“å¬", "é—®é—®", "äº†è§£ä¸‹", "æ¢ä¸‹", "å’¨è¯¢ä¸‹", "åé¦ˆ", "è½¬è¾¾", "åŒæ­¥", "æ²Ÿé€š", "å‚¬ä¸€ä¸‹", "æé†’ä¸‹", "å•†é‡", "åè°ƒ", "èƒ½ä¸èƒ½", "è¡Œä¸è¡Œ", "è¦ä¸è¦", "æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯", "å¥½ä¸å¥½", "éœ€ä¸éœ€è¦"]
DEFINE {{info_keywords}}: List = ["æ—¶é—´", "æ¡£æœŸ", "èŠ‚ç‚¹", "ç´ æ", "æ ·å“", "ç”»é¢", "æ–‡æ¡ˆ", "è„šæœ¬", "é£æ ¼", "æˆæƒ", "logo", "å‘ç¥¨", "æŠ¥é”€", "æ¯”ä¾‹", "å–ç‚¹", "å†…å®¹", "å®¢æœ", "åœºåœ°", "èŠ‚ç‚¹", "é“¾æ¥", "è´¹ç”¨", "å‘å¸ƒ", "å¯„é€", "åˆ°è´¦"]
DEFINE {{greeting_keywords}}: List = ["è¾›è‹¦", "è°¢è°¢", "æ‚¨å¥½", "æ—©ä¸Šå¥½", "æ™šä¸Šå¥½", "è¾›è‹¦å•¦", "æ„Ÿè°¢"]
DEFINE {{report_keywords}}: List = ["å·²ä¸Šä¼ ", "æ‹å®Œ", "å®Œæˆ", "å·²å®Œæˆ", "å·²å‘", "å·²æäº¤", "å·²å¤„ç†"]

DEFINE {{is_report}}: Boolean = False
FOR {{kw}} IN {{report_keywords}}
    IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{kw}}
        {{is_report}} = True
    ENDIF
ENDFOR
DEFINE {{is_internal}}: Boolean = False
FOR {{kw}} IN {{internal_keywords}}

IF {{is_greeting}} OR {{is_report}} OR {{is_internal}}
    {{judgement}} = 0

        FOR {{kw}} IN {{scene_kw_list}}

        FOR {{act}} IN {{scene_action_list}}
            IF {{input_text}} CONTAINS {{act}}
                {{action_matched}} = True
            ENDIF
        ENDFOR
        IF {{kw_matched}} AND {{action_matched}}
            {{scene_matched}} = True
        ENDIF
    ENDFOR
    IF {{scene_matched}}

            {{judgement}} = 1
            {{content}} = CALL generate_relay_content({{input_text}})
        ELSE
            {{judgement}} = 0

RETURN {{result}}
